General.Name: Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited
General.Description: Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited operates as a multi-format and multi-category retailing platform in Southeast Asia and Italy. It operates through Fashion, Hardline, Food and Property segments. The company focuses on apparel, accessories, electronics, and home improvement products, as well as groceries. It also provides vitamins, dietary supplements, and medical supplies by doctors, as well as leases retail property to third parties. Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: 22 Soi Somkid Ploenchit Road, Bangkok, Thailand, 10330
